scripts.start: npm run build && npm run introduction  && npm run start-server
scripts.migration:create: npm run build && npx typeorm migration:create
scripts.migration:generate: npm run build && npx typeorm migration:generate -d build/src/db/data-source.db.js
scripts.migration:run: npm run build && npx typeorm migration:run -d build/src/db/data-source.db.js
scripts.migration:revert: npm run build && npx typeorm migration:revert -d build/src/db/data-source.db.js
